summary.span: 包装 ActiveX 控件，并将它们作为功能完整的 Windows 窗体控件公开。

span.span: Wraps ActiveX controls and exposes them as fully featured Windows Forms controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常不会直接使用类。You typically do not use the class directly. 可以使用[aximp.exe (Windows 窗体 ActiveX 控件导入程序)](~/docs/framework/tools/aximp-exe-windows-forms-activex-control-importer.md)来生成扩展的包装。You can use the [Aximp.exe (Windows Forms ActiveX Control Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/aximp-exe-windows-forms-activex-control-importer.md) to generate the wrappers that extend . ActiveX 控件导入程序会生成一个派生自类的类, 并将其编译为可作为引用添加到应用程序的库文件 (DLL)。The ActiveX Control Importer generates a class that is derived from the class, and compiles it into a library file (DLL) that can be added as a reference to your application. 或者, 可以将`/source`开关与 ActiveX 控件导入程序一起使用, 并为C# 派生类生成文件。Alternatively, you can use the `/source` switch with the ActiveX Control Importer and a C# file is generated for your derived class. 然后, 您可以对代码进行更改, 然后将其重新编译为库文件。You can then make changes to the code and recompile it into a library file. > [!NOTE] > 如果 activex 控件的成员名称与 .NET Framework 中定义的名称相匹配, 则在创建派生类时, activex 控件导入程序会在成员名称前加上 "Ctl" 作为前缀。If the name of a member of the ActiveX control matches a name defined in the .NET Framework, then the ActiveX Control Importer will prefix the member name with "Ctl" when it creates the derived class. 例如, 如果 ActiveX 控件有一个名为 "Layout" 的成员, 它将在派生类中重命名为 "CtlLayout", 因为该事件是在 .NET Framework 中定义的。 `Layout`For example, if your ActiveX control has a member named "Layout", it is renamed "CtlLayout" in the derived class because the `Layout` event is defined within the .NET Framework. 如果基础 ActiveX 控件公开这些属性 , 则该类的大多数公共属性都是有效的, 并且使用。Most of the common properties of the class are only valid and used if the underlying ActiveX control exposes those properties. 常见属性的几个示例包括、 、和。A few examples of the common properties are , , , and . > [!NOTE] > 如果使用 Visual Studio 作为 Windows 窗体设计环境, 则可以通过将 ActiveX 控件添加到工具箱, 使 ActiveX 控件可用于应用程序。If you are using Visual Studio as your Windows Forms design environment, you can make an ActiveX control available to your application by adding the ActiveX control to your Toolbox. 若要实现此目的, 请右键单击 "**工具箱**", 选择 "**自定义工具箱**", 然后浏览到 ActiveX 控件的 .ocx 文件。To accomplish this, right-click the **Toolbox**, select **Customize Toolbox**, then browse to the ActiveX control's.ocx file. 有关详细信息, 请参阅 Visual Studio 文档中的 "将 ActiveX 控件添加到 Windows 窗体"。For more information, see "Adding ActiveX Controls to Windows Forms" in the Visual Studio documentation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写构造函数, 以及包装 Microsoft 掩码编辑 ActiveX 控件的派生类的和方法。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此代码要求你已创建生成的源代码, 方法是在 MSMask32 文件上运行 aximp.exe, 并使用`/source`开关生成要编辑的包装类。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此代码仅在语法中C#显示, 因为这是 aximp.exe 所输出的唯一语言。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`flags`参数值的二进制表示形式包含值0x1 表示的位, 则该控件的快捷菜单将不包含**编辑**选项, 除非 ActiveX 控件显式提供该选项。If the binary representation of the `flags` parameter value contains the bit represented by the value 0x1, the shortcut menu for the control will not contain an **Edit** option unless the ActiveX control explicitly provides it. 如果`flags`参数值的二进制表示形式包含值0x2 所表示的位, 则当 ActiveX 控件提供一组属性页时, 该控件的快捷菜单将包含一个属性选项; 否则, 快捷菜单仅当 ActiveX 控件显式提供属性选项时, 才会包含该选项。If the binary representation of the `flags` parameter value contains the bit represented by the value 0x2, the shortcut menu for the control will contain a Properties option if the ActiveX control offers a set of property pages; otherwise, the shortcut menu will contain a Properties option only if the ActiveX control explicitly provides it.

returns.span: 一个双精度浮点数，它包含与指定的 值等效的 OLE 自动化日期。

span.span: A double-precision floating-point number that contains an OLE Automation date equivalent to specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks OLE 自动化日期是作为浮点数实现的, 其值为从1899年12月30日午夜算起的天数。An OLE Automation date is implemented as a floating-point number whose value is the number of days from midnight, 30 December 1899. 例如, 1899 年12月31日午夜1.0 表示,6 A.M., 1 月 1 1900 日表示, 2.25;1899年12月29日午夜表示-1.0;和6月6日上午 6 1899, 表示为-1.25。For example, midnight, 31 December 1899 is represented by 1.0; 6 A.M., 1 January 1900 is represented by 2.25; midnight, 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.0; and 6 A.M., 29 December 1899 is represented by -1.25. 基础 OLE 自动化日期为1899年12月30日。The base OLE Automation Date is midnight, 30 December 1899. 最大 OLE 自动化日期与9999年 12 月31日最后一刻的日期相同。The maximum OLE Automation Date is the same as , the last moment of 31 December 9999. 有关 OLE 自动化的详细信息, 请参阅[MSDN library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: 此实例的值无法表示为 OLE 自动化日期。

span.span: The value of this instance cannot be represented as an OLE Automation Date.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familystatic hidebysig valuetype System.DateTime GetTimeFromOADate(float64 date) cil managed
Protected Shared Function GetTimeFromOADate (date As Double) As DateTime

param.name: date
param.span: 要转换的 OLE 自动化日期。

span.span: The OLE Automate date to translate.

summary.span: 返回与指定的 OLE 自动化日期对应的 结构。

span.span: Returns a structure that corresponds to the specified OLE Automation date.

returns.span: 表示与 相同的日期和时间的 。

span.span: A that represents the same date and time as .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `date`参数是一个双精度浮点数, 表示日期作为基准日期早于或晚于1899年12月30日的天数。The `date` parameter is a double-precision floating-point number that represents a date as the number of days before or after the base date, midnight, 30 December 1899. 的`date`符号和整数部分将日期编码为从30年 12 1899 月30日起的正数或负数次偏移, 并`date`将一天中的时间编码为从午夜开始进行日置换的一小部分。The sign and integral part of `date` encode the date as a positive or negative day displacement from 30 December 1899, and the absolute value of the fractional part of `date` encodes the time of day as a fraction of a day displacement from midnight. `date`必须是介于负657435.0 到正2958466.0 之间的值。`date` must be a value between negative 657435.0 through positive 2958466.0. 请注意, 由于编码日期的方式, 有两种方法可以表示一天中的任何时间 (1899 年12月30日)。Note that because of the way dates are encoded, there are two ways of representing any time of day on 30 December 1899. 例如,-0.5 和0.5 都表示30年 12 1899 月30日, 因为从基准日期算起的加减或减零天数仍是基准日期, 而从午夜开始的半天置换为中午。For example, -0.5 and 0.5 both mean noon on 30 December 1899 because a day displacement of plus or minus zero days from the base date is still the base date, and a half day displacement from midnight is noon. 有关 OLE 自动化的详细信息, 请参阅[MSDN library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information about OLE Automation, see the [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118).

exception.span: 日期不是有效的 OLE 自动化日期值。

span.span: The date is not a valid OLE Automation Date value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法还允许派生类处理方法而无需附加委托。 The method also allows derived classes to handle the method without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理方法的首选方法。This is the preferred technique for handling the method in a derived class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将重写构造函数, 以及包装 Microsoft 掩码编辑 ActiveX 控件的派生类的和方法。The following code example overrides the constructor, and the and methods of an derived class that wraps the Microsoft Masked Edit ActiveX Control. 此代码要求你已创建生成的源代码, 方法是在 MSMask32 文件上运行 aximp.exe, 并使用`/source`开关生成要编辑的包装类。This code requires that you have created the generated source code by running the AxImp.exe on the MSMask32.ocx file with the `/source` switch to generate the wrapper class to be edited. 此代码仅在语法中C#显示, 因为这是 aximp.exe 所输出的唯一语言。This code is only shown in C# syntax because that is the only language output by the AxImp.exe. [!code-csharp[AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/AxHost_Wrap_MaskEdit/CS/axmsmask.cs#1)]

para.span: 当在派生类中重写时, 请确保调用基类的方法, 以便注册的委托接收方法。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ShowPropertyPages() cil managed

summary.span: 显示与 ActiveX 控件关联的属性页。

span.span: Displays the property pages associated with the ActiveX control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 为`false`, 则不显示任何属性页。If is `false`, no property pages are displayed. 属性页允许 ActiveX 控件用户查看和更改 ActiveX 控件属性。Property pages allow an ActiveX control user to view and change ActiveX control properties. 可以通过调用 "控件属性" 对话框来访问这些属性, 其中包含一个或多个属性页, 它们提供自定义的图形界面, 可用于查看和编辑控件属性。These properties are accessed by invoking a control properties dialog box, which contains one or more property pages that provide a customized, graphical interface for viewing and editing the control properties.
